tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE backup_data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  data JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE backups (
  backup_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  backup_name VARCHAR(255),
  backup_date TIMESTAMP,
  backup_location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE disaster_recovery (
  recovery_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  recovery_status VARCHAR(50),
  recovery_date TIMESTAMP,
  recovery_location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE databases (
  db_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  db_name VARCHAR(255),
  db_size INT,
  db_owner VARCHAR(100),
  db_backup_id UUID REFERENCES backups(backup_id)
)

CREATE TABLE platforms (
  platform_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  platform_name VARCHAR(100),
  platform_type VARCHAR(50),
  platform_owner VARCHAR(100),
  platform_backup_id UUID REFERENCES backups(backup_id)
)

CREATE TABLE backup_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    job_id INT,
    backup_time TIMESTAMP,
    backup_status VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY(job_id) REFERENCES backup_jobs(job_id)
);

CREATE TABLE recovery_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_id INT,
    log_time TIMESTAMP,
    log_message TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY(plan_id) REFERENCES recovery_plans(plan_id)
);
